57444.<voice 00165_00057444><start_lip_sync n0:

Sadak, a traveling medium.<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57445.<voice 00255_00057445><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00255_00057445><start_lip_sync n02169 _normal m00001>You have a slightly different color
soul than most people. Hmm. What is
your name?<stop_lip_animation n02169 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57446.<voice 00320_00057446><start_lip_sync n0:
So. You mean ? I am here to save this town from the evil spirits. If you have any problems,
please feel free to contact me.

57447.<voice 00120_00057447><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00120_00057447><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I see you brought me a letter. You
don't have to tell me. I know.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57448.<voice 00170_00057448><start_lip_sync n0:
Today is here. He delivered a letter from Lucolia, but he talks about some incomprehensible
things.

57449.<voice 00200_00057449><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00200_00057449><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>There is another Town of Celed where
we are supposed to be dead.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57450.<voice 00230_00057450><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00230_00057450><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I'm a little relieved to know that
Lucolia is safe, but I'm not sure
what's going on here.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57451.<voice 00315_00057451><start_lip_sync n0:
I found this diary that you gave me back. I read it and found that it was kept on the date of your sister's
death.

57452.<voice 00365_00057452><start_lip_sync n0:
This beautiful handwriting is definitely my sister's. It's as if her writings in heaven come to life in
this diary.

57453.<voice 00395_00057453><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00395_00057453><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>The adults and I are gone. Muccino of
Famililar, and the Majin. And the
traveler named <pc>.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57454.<voice 00435_00057454><start_lip_sync n0:
I asked you to run an errand for me to test you, but I knew you could go to my sisters. I asked you to run an
errand for me to test me.

57455.<pc>は 偽りのレンダーシアにある\nセレドの町で見てきたことを 説明した。:
<pc> described what he had
seen in the Town of Celed in False
Lendersia.

57456.<voice 00535_00057456><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00535_00057456><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>Firo Mizar Miraka. They all died in
that gaket collapse.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57457.<voice 00595_00057457><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00595_00057457><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>The Town of Celed you say you went to
is inhabited by dead children.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57458.<voice 00635_00057458><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00635_00057458><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>I don't know what the logic is, but as
long as I have this journal, I will
always be connected to my dead sister.<stop_lip_animation n02156 CLOSE_MOUTH>

57459.<voice 00685_00057459><start_lip_sync n0:
<voice 00685_00057459><start_lip_sync n02156 _normal m00001>That's good to know. This is to thank
